sk_summambitsec: Theodora has over 15 years of experience in the Foreign Policy sphere having served as a Diplomat, Department Head and Analyst for the South African government. Theodora has held a number of portfolios through-out her career in the civil service either leading or working in a team, additional experience includes serving as a training consultant for a number of years, crafting and delivering various training programs to diplomats and government entities. Extensive experience in leading research and analysis teams ranging from 4 to 10 analysists, these responsibilities included operational and budgetary oversight of the team members.
